scripts.start: budo source/index.js:build/bundle.js --live --pushstate -- -t [ sheetify/transform ] -t [ babelify --plugins [ static-fs ] --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: browserify source/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ sheetify/transform ] -t [ babelify --plugins [ static-fs ] --presets [ es2015 ] ]
